# My Blog Repo

![Node.js >= 20](https://img.shields.io/badge/node.js-%3E%3D20-brightgreen) 
![pnpm >= 9](https://img.shields.io/badge/pnpm-%3E%3D9-blue) 
[![DeepWiki](https://img.shields.io/badge/DeepWiki-saicaca%2Ffuwari-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://deepwiki.com/saicaca/fuwari)

This is my static blog built with [Astro](https://astro.build) \& [Fuwari](https://github.com/saicaca/fuwari)

## Welcome to Add your site !

Welcome to All friends who want to add their site to my blog ! Just send me a message like this:

```toml
[[friendLinks.links]]
name = "Your name"
description = "Your slogan"
avatar = "Your avatar file or url"
url = "Your site url"
```
